item.title: 普拉博沃在推动遗产传承过程中与中国经济崛起的设计师合作
item.description:
印尼总统成立了主权财富基金，为其标志性项目重新分配了数十亿资金，并希望影响货币政策。投资者担心他的雄心壮志没有与现实的政策相匹配。【原文：

The Indonesian president has formed a sovereign wealth fund, reallocated billions for his signature programs and wants to influence monetary policy. Investors are concerned his ambitions aren’t matched by realistic policies.

】

item.title: 报告显示美国通胀率飙升，黄金周线收跌
item.description: 在通胀回升之后，交易员们减少了对美联储下月降息的押注，黄金因此而出现周度跌幅。【原文：Gold headed for a weekly loss, after traders pared bets on the Federal Reserve cutting rates next month following a pick-up in inflation.】

item.title: 日本经济在关税冲击下仍超预期增长
item.description: 在稳健的国内需求带动下，日本上一季度经济增长速度超过预期，这给陷入困境的首相石破茂带来了一些难得的好消息，因为他在上个月历史性的大选受挫后抵挡住了辞职的呼声。【原文：Japan’s economy expanded faster than expected last quarter led by solid domestic demand, giving embattled Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba some rare good news as he fends off calls to resign following last month’s historic election setback.】

item.title: 不温不火的一周结束后石油价格趋于平稳，关注特朗普与普京的会谈
item.description: 本日和本周石油价格持稳，投资者关注周五晚些时候美国和俄罗斯总统之间的会晤。【原文：Oil was steady for the day and the week, with investors focused on the meeting between the US and Russian presidents later on Friday.】

item.title: 秘鲁维持利率不变，决策者在评估关税损失
item.description: 秘鲁维持利率不变，因为低于目标的通胀率使政策制定者可以灵活地等待大选的不确定性和美国关税对经济增长和物价的影响。【原文：Peru kept interest rates unchanged as below-target inflation gives policymakers the flexibility to wait to see how election uncertainty and US tariffs affect growth and prices.】

item.title: 台湾自美国征税以来首次修正经济增长展望
item.description: 自特朗普政府对出口到美国的商品征收 20% 的关税以来，台湾将对其 2025 年的经济增长预期进行修订，这也是台湾对其经济表现预期的首次亮相。【原文：Taiwan is set to revise its estimate for growth in 2025, providing the first glimpse of how it expects the economy to perform since the Trump administration imposed a 20% duty on exports to the US.】

item.title: 大卫-泰珀收购被打压的联合健康，削减中国赌注
item.description: 亿万富翁大卫-泰珀（David Tepper）展示了他作为逆向投资者的风格，他在第二季度收购了陷入困境的联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：Billionaire David Tepper showcased his style as a contrarian investor, scooping up shares of beleaguered UnitedHealth Group Inc. in the second quarter while trimming stakes in Chinese stocks.】

item.title: 美国股市涨势受阻，亚洲股市开盘不温不火：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开局不温不火，此前通胀回升阻止了美国股市的涨势，并推高了债券收益率，因为交易员减少了对美联储降息的押注。【原文：Equities in Asia were set for a tepid start after a pick-up in inflation halted a rally in US stocks and lifted bond yields as traders pared bets of Federal Reserve interest-rates cuts.】

item.title: 对冲基金在持仓调整中增持微软、Netflix：13F 报告综述
item.description: 对冲基金在第二季度增持了包括微软公司和 Netflix 公司在内的科技巨头股票，这一时期的波动最初因唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策而激增，但最终以主要基准大幅上涨而告终。【原文：Hedge funds added exposure to technology giants including Microsoft Corp. and Netflix Inc. in the second quarter, a stretch that saw an initial surge in volatility due to President Donald Trump’s trade policies but ultimately ended with major benchmarks posting significant gains.】

item.title: 投资者希望从日本科技公司的现金储备中获得更多回报
item.description: 日本科技企业向股东返还更多现金的压力日益增大，这可能会刺激下一阶段的企业改革，而企业改革曾帮助推动日本股市屡创新高。【原文：Increasing pressure on Japan’s technology firms to return more cash to shareholders may spur the next phase of corporate reforms that helped drive the nation’s stock market to record highs.】

item.title: 收益超预期，Equinox 黄金期权赌注迅速获得 170% 的收益
item.description: 一名投资者周二买入了价值 600 万股的 Equinox Gold Corp. 看涨期权，在这家总部位于温哥华的矿业公司盈利超出预期后，他的资金翻了一番多，股价也创下了自 2022 年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：An investor who bought 6 million shares worth of Equinox Gold Corp. call options Tuesday more than doubled their money after the Vancouver-based miner’s earnings beat estimates, sending shares soaring by the most since 2022.】

item.title: 据称特朗普政府将讨论入股英特尔公司
